ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-14: Owner verification array is empty. Cannot generate pdf document
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-15: Error generating owner verification pdf document
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-16: Owner verification district error (district is missing or owners are from different districts)
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-17: User not provided. Cannot create or update record
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-18: District not provided. Cannot create or update record
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-19: Shared Key not provided. Cannot create Business to Owner relationship
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-20: Invalid Shared Key or Postal Code. Cannot create Business to Owner relationship
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-21: Invalid Shared Key. Owner already related to Business
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-22: Postal Code not provided. Cannot create Business to Owner relationship
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-25: Rental Agreement must be In Progress. Cannot delete
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-26: Rental Agreement must be in the User's District. Cannot delete
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-27: Rental Agreement is already associated with a Rental Request. Cannot delete
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-28: A rental request already exists for this area and equipment type
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-29: The maximum number of blank rental agreements already exist for this district
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-31: Equipment transfer only can only happen between two owners in the same district
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-32: Equipment transfer only can only happen between two active owners
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-33: Invalid equipment record, cannot transfer between owners
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-34: Equipment transfer only can only happen between two different owners
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-35: No rental agreement found for this equipment and project
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-36: No rental agreement found for the current fiscal year
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-37: All equipment associated with this type must be Archived before it can be deleted
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-38: An active or inactive account with this User Id already exists
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-39: District Equipment Type has been deleted, equipment cannot be activated
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-40: This owner has equipment that is part of an In Progress Rental Request. Release the list (finish hiring / delete) before making this change
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-41: This equipment is part of an In Progress Rental Request. Release the list (finish hiring / delete) before making this change
ExceptionDescriptions.HETS-42: There is currently no equipment available to hire from this list
